document.full_text: dwyane wade and miami sent a strong message to their eastern conference tormenters the boston celtics with a 99-90 victory sunday that gave the heat an early edge in the heavyweight second round playoff matchup.
document.title: heat sizzle against celtics as grizzlies maul thunder
lines_and_colors: dwyane wade and miami sent a strong message to their eastern conference tormenters the boston celtics with a 99-90 victory sunday that gave the heat an early edge in the heavyweight second round playoff matchup.
